document_data.name: Lord Braelbane
document_data.mainbody: Lord '''Braelbane''' was a nobleman of [[Cormyr]], and a head of House [[Braelbane]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{cite book/Bury Elminster Deep|85|9}}
document_data.Personality: Per [[Arclath Delcastle]], he was "a tiresome windhorn".
document_data.Description: He was notably old, "year-in and year-out".
document_data.Relationships: He was the head of House [[Braelbane]].
document_data.History: Lord Braelbane was one of the guests of the [[Council of the Dragon]] in late [[Mirtul]] of the {{yearlinkName|1479}}.
